note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Bookmarklet to print a Trello storyboard as index cards
name: Trello Cards
body:
# Pivotal Cards Printable index cards for your [Trello](https://www.trello.com) project
  1. Drag the trello-cards bookmarklet to your bookmarks bar
  2. Run the bookmark from within trello board page.
  3. Print on A4 in landscape mode, cut and and fold in half
  4. Fork me on GitHub
Based on [pivotal-cards](https://github.com/psd/pivotal-cards) by [psd](http://whatfettle.com) and inspired by David.
